analyzer module¶

Analyzes raw data to produce values of interest for the metrics dictionary.

analyzer.produceBeats(data)¶

Finds the beats in the ECG strip.

Parameters:data – numpy array with data
Returns:numpy array with indices of peaks
analyzer.produceDuration(data)¶

Calculates time duration of the ECG strip.

Parameters:data – numpy array with data
Returns:float duration of signal
analyzer.produceMeanHR(numBeats, duration)¶

Calculates mean heart rate from data.

Parameters:
  • numBeats – integer number of beats in ECG strip
  • duration – float duration of strip
Returns:

mean heart rate as integer beats per minute
analyzer.produceNumBeats(peakInds)¶

Counts the number of beats in the ECG strip.

Parameters:peakInds – numpy array with indices of peaks
Returns:integer number of beats in ECG strip
analyzer.produceNumpy(data)¶

Produces a 2-row numpy array from the raw data

Parameters:rawData – list of lists time and voltage
Returns:numpy array
analyzer.produceTimesOfBeats(data, peakInds)¶

Calculates timepoints at which beats occurred.

Parameters:
  • data – numpy array with data
  • peakInds – nump array with indices of peaks
Returns:

numpy array of times at which beats occurred
analyzer.produceVoltageExtremes(data)¶

Calculates minimum and maximum lead voltages.

Parameters:data – numpy array with data
Returns:tuple of floats: minimum and maximum voltages

Heart Rate Monitor
